name: Launch an SMS marketing campaign from Airtable with sms77.io
description: This scenario can be run at specific intervals to send personalized SMS. Every day, Make will filter customers whose birthday is on the current day. Then, their phone number is formatted and a personalized birthday message is sent via sms77.io. This template uses [the SMS marketing model](https://airtable.com/templates/marketing/expfcuBALza29DFZd/restaurant-marketing) from Airtable.
